allow: Bash(DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE=arkham_nexus.settings python3 -c "import django; django.setup(); from django.conf import settings; print(f''DEBUG: {settings.DEBUG}'')")

Bash(DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE=arkham_nexus.settings python3 -c "
import django
django.setup()
from django.contrib.auth import get_user_model
User = get_user_model()
test_users = [''keeper1'', ''keeper2'', ''investigator1'', ''investigator2'', ''investigator3'', ''investigator4'', ''investigator5'', ''investigator6'', ''admin'']
for username in test_users:
    exists = User.objects.filter(username=username).exists()
    print(f''{username}: {""EXISTS"" if exists else ""NOT FOUND""}'')")
